use_minimum_set.help: use pre configured minimum set which reduce most of features but allows to run icetea tests. Defaults to 'false' when not set

enable_aliases.help: enable alias feature. Defaults to 'true' when not set

enable_escape_handling.help: enable escape handling. Defaults to 'true' when not set

enable_operators.help: enable operators. Defaults to 'true' when not set

enable_internal_commands.help: enable internal commands, like echo, set, unset. Defaults to 'true' when not set

use_dummy_set_and_echo.help: when enable_internal_commands is disabled this can be used to activate dummy set and echo commands that is needed for icetea tests. Defaults to 'false' when not set

enable_internal_variables.help: enable internal variables. Defaults to 'true' when not set

include_man.help: include man pages. Defaults to 'true' when not set

max_line_length.help: maximum input line length. Defaults to 2000 when not set

args_max_count.help: maximum arguments count. Defaults to 30 when not set

enable_history.help: enable command history. Defaults to 'true' when not set

history_max_count.help: maximum history count. Defaults to 32 when not set

boot_message.help: Set custom boot message when calling cmd_init() or cmd_init_screen()

enable_internal_traces.help: Enable internal traces. Defaults to 'false' when not set

enable_deep_internal_traces.help: Enable more verbose internal traces. Defaults to 'false' when not set
